issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description: When try to delete a non-existing user it tries three times and then exits with a 500 InternalFailure, {noformat} [root@h-31 .euca]# euare-accountdel -a testaccount1 -r --debug Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/bin/euare-accountdel", line 6, in euca2ools.commands.euare.deleteaccount.DeleteAccount.run() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 289, in run cmd.handle_cli_exception(err) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 286, in run result = cmd.main() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 181, in main response = self.send() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 143, in send return self.handle_server_error(err) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 130, in send params=params, data=self.body) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/service.py", line 234, in send_request self.handle_http_error(response) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/euare/__init__.py", line 53, in handle_http_error raise AWSError(response) euca2ools.exceptions.AWSError: (500, 'Internal Server Error', 'InternalFailure', 'Failed to find account') {noformat} It should return something like '404 AccountNotFound' or '404 NoSuchEntity'
fields.summary: euare-accountdel results 500 InternalFailure for non-existing account

comments.body: The error response should depend on whether the caller is authorized to delete accounts (to help prevent account discovery by unauthorized users)
In this case, the account delete call was made by eucalyptus admin user or any user in the eucalyptus admin account.
